wikipedia_page.main: Julian Massiah McDonald (born 20 August 1990) is an Montserratian footballer who plays for Shepshed Dynamo. He made his international debut for Montserrat in March 2015.

response: Marshall did however earn his first international cap playing for Montserrat on 16 November 2019, coming on as a substitute in a Nations League B fixture away to El Salvador. Willock earned his second cap on 20 November 2019, coming on as a 90th minute substitute for Massiah McDonald in a Nations League B fixture away to Saint Lucia.
